# Aspect of the Chromatic Dragon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]]) \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S, Evil

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Dragon Magic (WotC), pg. 64

*Your body becomes powerfully muscled as multicolored settles cover your flesh. Four draconic heads sprout from your shoulders.*

You take the form of an aspect of Tiamat. You gain 100 temporary hit points, which disappear at the end of the spell's duration.

*Evil:* Only evil-aligned characters can cast this spell.
